comments.body: Do we still need all this generator stuff if we aren't doing testing? Does this affect how things are configured by Eigen?

Runs a basic test suite. This is really nice as it is pretty quick, but still makes sure the install was ok. Given the full test suite is too long to run on CI without issues and has known test failures. This is a nice balance. Thanks @patricksnape for adding this.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +47,51 @@rem Just make the basic tests as all the tests take too long to run.
FOR /L %%A IN (1,1,7) DO (
  cmake --build . --config %CMAKE_CONFIG% --target basicstuff_%%A
)
ctest -R basicstuff*
